s: ^GRIM: I notice you look a little... goopy at the moment. Did something happen?
^You know I have to ask, you're green all over!
^Fine, I won't. This is my non-curious face.

c-1: ^CAT: Ugh. If you must know, I was partially eaten by a giant... I don't even know what it was.
^A man-eating snail maybe. But then I got stuck half-way down and had to cut my way out. Hence the goop.
c-2: ^GRIM: But I'm sure it was badass.

g-1: ^GRIM: Our job kinds sucks, huh? We're either doing paperwork or getting gooped- we don't even get regular time off.
^CAT: I suppose, when you say it that way. But I actually really like this job.

c-3: ^CAT: In a way, we have the easiest job in the world. It's the opposite of a life or death situation.
^No matter what happens with the client, they can't make any more mistakes.
^Whether they're going to reincarnate, go to the afterlife, or just find eternal rest, this stage of their existence is done. No going back.

s: ^I never thought of it that way.

g-3: ^CAT: It's a bit different for everyone, I guess. When someone moves on, they can let go of stress and pain, and just... be for a bit.
^Until whatever happens next happens. I envy that state of existence a bit.

s: ^Me too, dude...Well, I'm ready to get back to it. Feel like reaping a few souls?
